    to bottom,
    #ffa500, /* Laranja vibrante */
    #ffffff  /* Branco */

  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  background-clip: text;
  color: transparent;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

h2:hover {
  color: #ff4500; /* Laranja claro no hover */
}

.text-info {
  background: linear-gradient(
    to bottom,
    #ffa500,
    #ffffff
  );
  -webkit-background-clip: text;
  background-clip: text;
  color: transparent;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.text-info:hover {
  color: #ff4500; /* Laranja claro no hover */
